LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Officio_Assassinorum_Culexus: [PAWN_nameDef] was recruited by the Culexus temple for showing the unique defect known as the Pariah Gene, this is a rare one in a billion condition that renders [PAWN_nameDef] immune to psychic powers. [PAWN_pronoun] was sent after enemies of the Imperium, specifically Psykers.
